mapper.select: SELECT R.EML_CD , R.EML_CALL_CD , R.SER_NO , R.REC_NM , R.EML_REF_YN , CASE WHEN R.EML_READ_YN = '1' THEN '읽음' ELSE '읽지않음' END AS LOC_NAME , R.EML_DEL_WH , M.EMP_CD , M.EML_TIT , M.EML_CON , M.EML_DEND_DT , M.EML_SIT_CD , M.EML_NO , R.EML_READ_YN, M.EML_IMP_YN FROM RECEIVER R LEFT OUTER JOIN MAIL M ON (R.EML_CD = M.EML_CD) WHERE R.EML_CALL_CD = #{empCd} AND R.EML_DEL_WH != 'Y' ORDER BY M.EML_DEND_DT DESC

SELECT '[' || D.DEP_NM || '] ' || X.EMP_NM || ' ' || C.COMM_CD_NM AS REC_TOT , X.* FROM ( SELECT A.EML_CD , A.EMP_CD , A.EML_TIT , A.EML_CON , A.EML_DEND_DT , TO_CHAR(A.EML_DEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EML_DEND_DT_TO_STRING , A.EML_SIT_CD , A.EML_NO , E.EMP_NM , E.DEP_CD , E.POSI_CD FROM MAIL A LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.EMP_CD = E.EMP_CD) WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd} ) X LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (X.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON (C.COMM_CD = X.POSI_CD)
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIL SET EML_DEL_WH = 1 WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd}
mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_CD , A.EMP_ID , A.EMP_NM , A.EMP_EML , B.DEP_CD , B.DEP_NM , C.COMM_CD , C.COMM_CD_NM FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEP_CD = B.DEP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON (A.POSI_CD = C.COMM_CD) WHERE 1 = 1 AND (EMP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchParam} ||'%') OR (DEP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchParam} ||'%')

SELECT A.EMP_CD , A.EMP_ID , A.EMP_NM , B.DEP_CD , B.DEP_NM , C.COMM_CD , C.COMM_CD_NM , '['|| B.DEP_NM || '] ' || A.EMP_NM || ' ' || C.COMM_CD_NM AS TOTAL
, CASE WHEN EMP_CD = (SELECT EMP_CD FROM MAIL WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd }) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END EMP_SELECTED
FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEP_CD = B.DEP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON (A.POSI_CD = C.COMM_CD) ORDER BY DEP_NM

SELECT A.EMP_CD , A.EMP_ID , A.EMP_NM , B.DEP_CD , B.DEP_NM , C.COMM_CD , C.COMM_CD_NM , '['|| B.DEP_NM || '] ' || A.EMP_NM || ' ' || C.COMM_CD_NM AS TOTAL
, CASE WHEN EMP_CD = (SELECT EMl_CALL_CD FROM RECEIVER R WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd } AND EML_REF_YN = 'Y' ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END EMP_SELECTED
FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEP_CD = B.DEP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON (A.POSI_CD = C.COMM_CD) ORDER BY DEP_NM

INSERT INTO MAIL ( EML_CD, EMP_CD, EML_TIT, EML_CON, EML_DEND_DT, EML_SIT_CD, EML_IMP_YN, ATCH_FILE_CD ) VALUES ( #{emlCd}, #{empCd}, #{emlTit}, #{emlCon}, sysdate, '0', #{emlImpYn} , #{attchFileCd} )

INSERT INTO TOTAL_ATCH_FILE ( ATCH_FILE_CD , ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_EXTEN , ATCH_FILE_UPLO_DT , ATCH_FILE_SIZE , ATCH_FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_SIT_CD ) VALUES ( #{atchFileCd }, #{atchFileNo }, #{atchFileNm }, #{atchFilePath }, #{atchFileExten }, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{atchFileSize }, #{atchFileOrgNm }, '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT R.EML_CD , R.EML_CALL_CD , R.SER_NO , R.REC_NM , R.EML_REF_YN , R.EML_DEL_WH , R.EML_READ_YN , M.EML_TIT , M.EML_CON , M.EML_DEND_DT , TO_CHAR(M.EML_DEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EML_DEND_DT_TO_STRING , M.EML_IMP_YN FROM RECEIVER R INNER JOIN MAIL M ON (R.EML_CD = M.EML_CD) WHERE EML_CALL_CD = #{emlCallCd} AND R.EML_DEL_WH = 'Y'
SELECT ATCH_FILE_CD FROM MAIL WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT M.EML_CD , M.EMP_CD , M.EML_TIT , M.EML_CON , TO_CHAR(M.EML_DEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EML_DEND_DT_TO_STRING , M.EML_SIT_CD , M.EML_NO, M.EML_SEND_YN, CASE WHEN M.EML_READ_YN = '1' THEN '읽음' ELSE '읽지않음' END AS LOC_NAME, M.EML_READ_YN, M.EML_IMP_YN FROM MAIL M WHERE M.EMP_CD = #{emlCallCd} ORDER BY EML_DEND_DT DESC

SELECT '[' || D.DEP_NM || '] ' || X.EMP_NM || ' ' || C.COMM_CD_NM AS REC_TOT , X.* FROM ( SELECT R.EML_CD , R.EML_CALL_CD , R.SER_NO , R.REC_NM , R.EML_REF_YN , R.EML_DEL_WH , R.EML_READ_YN , E.POSI_CD , E.DEP_CD , E.EMP_NM FROM RECEIVER R LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (R.EML_CALL_CD = E.EMP_CD) ) X LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEP_CD = X.DEP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON (C.COMM_CD = X.POSI_CD) WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd}

SELECT CASE WHEN ATCH_FILE_EXTEN LIKE '%text%' THEN 'tag tag-attachments-sm rounded-3 bg-info' WHEN ATCH_FILE_EXTEN LIKE '%xls%' THEN 'tag tag-attachments-sm rounded-3 bg-success' WHEN ATCH_FILE_EXTEN LIKE '%pdf%' THEN 'tag tag-attachments-sm rounded-3 bg-danger' WHEN ATCH_FILE_EXTEN LIKE '%zip%' THEN 'tag tag-attachments-sm rounded-3 bg-warning' ELSE 'tag tag-attachments-sm rounded-3 bg-primary' END FILE_CLASS , ATCH_FILE_CD , ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_DWNLD_TERM , ATCH_FILE_EXTEN , ATCH_FILE_UPLO_DT , ATCH_FILE_SIZE , ATCH_FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_SIT_CD FROM TOTAL_ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_CD = ( SELECT ATCH_FILE_CD FROM MAIL WHERE EML_CD = #{emlCd} )
